channel.title: RSCLives
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]RSCLives[/b][/size]
RSCLives is a Runescape Classic private server launcher on 31th of August, 2010. We are updating daily/weekly so prepare for more features to come.
If you're after a server thats like real RSC with better exp rates, stable, secure then come and give us a try. And if you do not find something you were really hoping for please let us know about it on the suggestions forum on our forum.
[b]Statistics & Information[/b] Launched: 31th August, 2010 XP Rate: 17x for non-subscribers, 20x for subscribers
[b]Getting Started[/b] 1. Go to [url=http://rsclives.sytes.net]RSCLives[/url] and register an account. 2. Then once your there REGISTER once more... But do not LOG OUT.. (the first account = FORUM the second = INGAME) 3. Go to the [url=http://rsclives.sytes.net/viewtopic.php?pid=17#p17]Play RSCLives[/url] page to download the client. 4. Login to RSCLives using your character login credentials you created in step two.
If you have any problems getting ingame or with stuff ingame please post on forum.
Working shops -- Updating the shops to include more items weekly. [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/15wkn89.jpg[/img]
Great Thieving Experience rate and money rate. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/25uo21e.jpg[/img]
Semi-great EXP rate at time of picture HAS BEEN UPDATED NOW! [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/jl3oro.jpg[/img]
Portals! [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/x1ng43.jpg[/img]
New admin ranks with new crowns! [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/ek19pd.jpg[/img]
Even more updates to come!! [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/v4861g.jpg[/img]
Client Login screen: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/ioqk4p.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @RSCLives RSCLives
item.description:
@RSCLives wrote:

marc110:

rsclives has 2 players max online now that is shit

Getting players isnt easy on RSC noob. My server is GREAT and is still IMPROVING and I have the peak at usually 6 players… but its very hard to get players. So please no flaming… Only constructive critism… Reported your post.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCLives
item.dc:creator: @RSCLives RSCLives
item.description:
@RSCLives wrote:

[quote=“00123987, post:13, topic:358095”][quote author=wicked happy link=topic=454607.msg3332159#msg3332159 date=1283571868]

So you took RSCAngel’s source then copied RSCEmulation’s portals, Mopar advertisement layout, in-game ranks (etc) and decided that was enough to open a server and start charging for subscriptions… :rolleyes:

[/quote]

x100[/quote]

Well what can I say… noobs will be noobs… Dont even read my post… thats pretty nooby… I gave Kryptix credit and yes I took the template because it was superb… But that doesnt mean jack shit… The ingame ranks were my idea… And you do not need to buy subscription alright goodfight noobs.

sw0o0sh:

So what exactly is on this server that hasn’t been rehashed and overdone for the past 2 years?

Well… not much I dont have a complete list in my head… But I am making new map parts and im also making more npcs items etc… So yes.

Read full topic
